name: TLBT - Telebuilder Test
description:
Controls:
A - move left.
D - move right.
W or Space - jump.
RMC - enter / leave Build Mode.
LMC - (in Build Mode) select platform to build AND build if after selection clicked on game field.
1, 2, 3,4 - (in Build Mode) select to build AND build if after selection LMC on game field.
R - reload game.

Mechanic :
Press RMC to enter in Build Mode.
By LMC or 1-2-3-4 select platform to build.
Click LMC on game field to build platform.
Building process require some Materia.
Platforms are different in cost and behaviour.
If you touch the floor, all builded platforms will disappear.

Plot:
You are Subject #617, first know person with telebuilds powers.
And this is your test!

Special for lame jam #26!
Engine:   KaboomJS (https://kaboomjs.com/)
Art:   https://f0x0ne.itch.io/ and https://foozlecc.itch.io/
Music:  https://joshuuu.itch.io/
SFX:   https://sfxr.me/
